headline: Robinhood Opens Pre IPO Access With New US$1b Closed End Fund
summary: Robinhood Markets has launched Robinhood Ventures Fund I, a $1 billion closed-end fund aimed at giving retail investors exposure to pre-IPO names including SpaceX, Stripe, and Databricks. The fund is being offered through an IPO structure, expanding Robinhood's product lineup beyond its core brokerage app. This move opens access to late-stage private companies that have typically been reserved for institutional and large accredited investors. NasdaqGS:HOOD is rolling out this new product...
